short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your password in the cloud

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to save passwords in your own cloud and share with all the devices you have.

It must be used with this backend (with https://github.com/superkekko/buddpassword) that you can install in your self hosted server (you just need php and apache to start it).
